methods.ascending:
Create an ascending SortPair for name.

:param name: (java.lang.String) - the column name to sort by
:return: (io.deephaven.engine.table.impl.SortPair) an ascending SortPair for name
methods.ascendingPairs:
Create an array of ascending SortPair for names.

:param names: (java.lang.String...) - the column names to sort by
:return: (io.deephaven.engine.table.impl.SortPair[]) an ascending SortPair array for names
methods.descending:
Create an descending SortPair for name.

:param name: (java.lang.String) - the column name to sort by
:return: (io.deephaven.engine.table.impl.SortPair) an descending SortPair for name
methods.descendingPairs:
Create an array of descending SortPair for names.

:param names: (java.lang.String...) - the column names to sort by
:return: (io.deephaven.engine.table.impl.SortPair[]) an descending SortPair array for names
methods.getColumn: :return: (java.lang.String) the column name for this SortPair.

text: A pair representing a column to sort by and its direction.
